description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. Kill your friends, earn medals, unlock new abilities, customize your character and so much more in Block Ops! Fight Zombies together, duel 16 players at once in Deathmatch or show off your strategy in Flag King.
description.short: Kill your friends, earn medals, unlock new abilities, customize your character and so much more in Block Ops! Fight Zombies together, duel 16 players at once in Deathmatch or show off your strategy in Flag King.
